Samples overviewÂ¶

Note

Both samples must be used in paralell to test KNX IoT functionality.

In the KNX IoT repository, all samples are placed in the samples directory. The following table outlines the differences in their configurations:

Sample

Hardware required

Description

Light Switch Actuator

nRF52840dk_nrf52840

Nordic KNX IoT Light Switch Actuator sample

Light Switch Sensor

nRF52840dk_nrf52840

Nordic KNX IoT Light Switch Sensor sample
